name: Steve Igo
review: I know Pastor Shane Bennett and this fine congregation quite well!  What a kind, warm and godly pastor with some great folks!  I wish Shane was my pastor, but I serve as a pastor over in Jenison. My loss is Calvin's gain! ;)

name: Tyler Gaastra
review: "Therefore let us be grateful for receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken, and thus let us offer to God acceptable worship, with reverence and awe, for our God is a consuming fire."

name: Daniel k
review: Pastor Shane and his wife are a true treasure.
